dict.string: • 1 oz Gin • CHIVITA 100% Orange and Pineapple juice • Ice cubes • A slice of orange
Mix all condiments in a glass and use the slice of orange as a garnish.
• 1 oz Rum • Chivita 100% Apple juice • Ice cubes • A slice of apple
Mix all condiments in a glass and use the slice of apple as a garnish.
• 1 oz Vodka • Chivita 100% Pineapple juice • Ice cubes • A slice of pineapple
Mix all condiments in a glass and use the slice of pineapple as a garnish.
• 1 oz Tequila • Chivita 100% Orange and Mango juice • Ice cubes • A slice of Orange
Mix all condiments in a glass and use the slice of orange as a garnish.

• 1 cup ice (crushed) • 1 shot rum • 1 shot rum (coconut flavoured) • 1 shot vodka • 1 shot gin • 2 shot CHIVITA orange juice • 1 shot CHIVITA pineapple juice • 1 shot grenadine syrup • 1 shot rum (proof) • 1 orange (slice optional) • 1 lime (slice optional)

1. Fill a hurricane glass with ice. Pour in the rum, coconut rum, vodka, gin, triple sec, orange juice, pineapple juice, and grenadine. Stir well with a bar spoon, then pour the rum over the back of the spoon to float the liquor on top of the drink. Garnish the glass with orange, lime, and a cherry. 2. Sip with a straw from the bottom for a ‘sneak up on you’ punch or sip from the top for a ‘knock you down’ twister.
• 4 shots CHIVITA orange juice and mango • 2 shot CHIVITA pineapple juice • 1 1/2 shot vodka • 1 shot grenadine • A dash of Tobasco sauce
1. Shake all spirits with 1/2 shaker of ice, pour it in a long glass and follow by 1 shot grenadine syrup and a dash of Tobasco on the drink 2. Garnish with slice pineapple on the rim.
• 100 ml CHIVITA pineapple juice • 200 ml tonic water • Some Crushed ice • 4 shots vodka • Half Pineapple
Put all ingredients into a shaker, but make the pineapple into chunks Then, shake, and serve instantly.
